measure.CatchLine: Prohibits municipality that administers and enforces building inspection program from adopting construction standards or methods from Reach Code, or similar or related code of standards and methods, that exceed or are more stringent than statewide standards and methods Director of Department of Consumer and Business Services adopts and administers.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Prohibits municipality that administers and enforces building inspection program from adopting construction standards or methods from Reach Code, or similar or related code of standards and methods, that exceed or are more stringent than statewide standards and methods Director of Department of Consumer and Business Services adopts and administers. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to construction standards for energy efficiency; amending ORS 455.500; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to construction standards for energy efficiency; prescribing an effective date.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Climate, Energy, and Environment.
